headline: The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BK) Could Be a Great Choice
summary: Dividends are one of the best benefits to being a shareholder, but finding a great dividend stock is no easy task. Does The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BK) have what it takes? Let's find out.
